title: When will Riot open PBE signups???
body: It's been four months and Riot didn't open PBE singups. Riot, can you open PBR singups, please? Me, and a lot of other players are waiting. And also AR URF is now on urf and we who didn't signup four months ago can't play it now on PBE. PLS RITO!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Its been almost a year or so that its been closed , looks like they will not open PBE signups ever again , wich is sad considering how few people there are there even after an important pre-season patch , and the fact that alot of bugs still hit the live server in a way that champions and even ranked are disabled just shows the lack of interest riot has on this topic , there is not enough people there or the people that are there they aren't doing a good enough job.

We haven't received any updates on the PBE site, but I know there's a lot of anticipation for it!  Keep an eye out on the [PBE status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)for updates.  Hang tight!
